INDIANAPOLIS, Jan. 27( UPI)-- Republican U.S. Rep. Mike Pence said Thursday he won't run for president in 2012, but he didn't rule out a run for governor of Indiana. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence said of his family in a letter sent to supporters, The Indianapolis Star reported.
